website_summaries.verdict: A well-constructed water doodle mat with a slimmer-than-average border. Thoughtful design maximizes the drawing surface without sacrificing aesthetics.
pros: Generous dimensions and a streamlined border leave more space for creative expression
Suction cups can be used to hang the mat up or to prevent shifting on hard floors
Comes with drawing and painting tools, a design booklet, and handy storage case
cons: Stencils don't fit in the storage case
Markers are on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: Very clean and safe for kids
customer_reviews.text: This magic mat is so good for my 18 month daughter, she really love painting or drawing something even nobody know what is that. This mat just use water to coloring, I don’t need worry about my daughter put the water pen into her mouth, also drawing on her clothes. Very clean. Even my 7 years old son love to drawing on it~~
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves playing with this (and mommy may as well!) The shape cutouts and small stamps are great for little ones. The pens are easy to fill with water and don’t seem to leak if you close them correctly. Lots of mess free fun!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase that will be used for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my 2 and 4 year old girls. They really enjoy it. Mess free, easy to use, and it can be used for a long time. Dries very quickly. My only issue is that it is VERY easy for the pens and stamp pad to cause mold. It had to air out, with the stamp pad left out of the case, overnight. Even after taking care to avoid it, it still became an isdue. Have to be very mindful. Outside of that avoidable issue, this is an overall great toy. Big enough for voth girls to use. I have decided to gift one to my nephew for his upcoming 4th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical

customer_reviews.title: good product for draw
customer_reviews.text: My girls love it very much. I am very satisfied too.I bought this water drawing mat this time.Before Every time childrens drawing. they made the house so dirty. I have to clean it up. And the smallest baby also put the brush to bite. It was really annoying me... so I didn't dare to buy this type of toy for a long time...I tried to buy this one this time. It doesn't use any paint, it just draws with water, and it doesn't get dirty. At the beginning, came out different colors, but after she made every wet, it came out a rainbow. They enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Rip off - suction cup issue.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a rip off- the suction cups only work on tile and glass- I don’t have a window that wide and don’t plan on my child playing in the bathroom so this is only useful on the floor but isn’t safe if your child runs on top of it. I emailed the seller and they told me the cups only suction on tile and glass, I expressed my disappointment and they didn’t do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Walker

customer_reviews.title: Aqua magic doodle
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this! & So do I!! They love painting and drawing but always make a mess.. With this you only use water so no mess left to clean up! Awesome!! If something happened to this one I'd definitely buy another! The mat is good size. Can lay flat on the floor or hang on a wall. Plenty big enough for 2-4kids at a time. Comes with a case with 6 stamps, 4 pencils and a paint brush. The paint brush doesn't work to well but the pencils work amazingly well & so do the stamps, also comes with stencils and foam punch outs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great but quality is poor. Gently used only for a month and the mat now dries up too quickly at the center and so my toddler cant scribble on it properly. They are super sneaky making sure the return window closes quickly so you cant even replace it. If your going to spend $20 buy some other mat. Just not ok to sell products like this to parents who genuinely just want something to work as expected. Not expecting perfection. But come on. 2 months shouldn't be the life of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and photoshopped
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this purchase. Quality is not good. The pen case is super flimsy and broke when we opened it. The suction cup doesn’t stick to the floor so the mat moves all over the place. The color book is just paper it’s not in any Binding and def not meant for the pens it comes with. Those kids in the marketing photo are definitely photoshopped. It’s big enough for two little ones not three. Just not a great purchase for long term use
customer_reviews.author: leomot

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the pens did not unscrew. another pen opened, but when I tried to open it again it would not open so the water was trapped inside the pen. The stencils are pointless because the water soaks through and it just makes a blob.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups dont work on any surface and can’t trace anything just turns into a wet circle. Funny thing is this was the XL size.. I guess the small would fit in your pocket. I know I should of checked measurements but 3 kids fit on mat in the picture..my 4 year old barely has room to draw hoods wet circles lolol jokes on me!! Not worth a trip to the post office to return this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Iheart Dr.Pepper

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how products sometimes get good reviews when the item stinks. Maybe trolls? Such is the case with this worthless drawing pad. It is so cheap. The caps on the markers do not come off. Everything is low quality. It went back two hours after I got it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ohs

customer_reviews.title: A big success after some experimentation!
customer_reviews.text: My two-year old granddaughter was perhaps too young for this. But I really wanted something that we could do together. She insisted on putting the markers in her mouth! No way to get her to understand that that was not a good idea. Eventually, I put the markers away and bought a small sponge and cut it into quarters. That worked perfectly. It was easier for her to hold, it made bold lines, and she wasn't tempted to put it in her mouth. Everyone was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the mess free idea of letting my child go crazy with the scribbling with this aqua mat...i kind of enjoy it more than my 20 month old...it's actually meant for older kids or atleast that's what the box says...it comes up with a number of pens with different point sizes and cute stamps... What i don't like is that the water may drip from the nib/tip of the pens which is a turn off and ot makes me want to dock off half a star but overall it's a good purchase! I am not going to comment on the durability cuz i think i have had for a over a week only..
customer_reviews.author: Xaveri

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Some lower case letters should be changed.
customer_reviews.text: First- I love this thing. My only complaint right now is the way the lower case letters of: a, i , j, and maybe t are. The “a” and “t” both look like the print of this writing. I prefer the “c” form of “a” and I don’t want the tail on the “t”. Other than those few things- it’s so awesome. The little box to hold all the pens and the stamp pad area and the stamps are all great. I’m waiting to see how well it dries but it’s quite humid here today so it may not do well but I’m hoping it will. I’ll update if there are any issues. I would def recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the mat but not the markers
customer_reviews.text: The kids (20m and 4yrs) love this mat! They enjoy coloring on it and tracing the letters with the pens. I love that it has letters on the border for them to practice with. I'm just not a fan of the markers it comes with. They're fine once you get them open, but the case they come in is tricky, and then the markers loosen/tighten in the opposite direction you'd expect. I can't get the cap off one of the markers at all. Some of the stencils are also a little small for the size of the marker tips. Hopefully the seller will work on the markers because it's a great mat.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Toddler especially likes the ABCs & Stamps
customer_reviews.text: Good value with lots of extras. My only criticism would be the suction cups provided for the corners. Are they meant for the floor? We've only used it on the wall, and I don't know who has that much wall space with a perfectly smooth surface for suction cups. I used velcro strips to hang it - it would have been great if the hanging hooks came with 3M strips instead. But it's such a low-stress drawing toy. No worries about anything drying out (except the drawing itself - there's not much time to make anything too complex before it disappears.)
customer_reviews.author: NJ Real Person

customer_reviews.title: Good clean fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this for my kids! We have had a lot of fun so far getting our hands and feet wet and making handprints and footprints on the mat. I love that it dries quickly and can be reused immediately after drying. It only requires water so the mess is practically nothing. The stencils included are cute and simple and fun to use. My 2 year old is having lots of fun, but she can EASILY get the water markers open and dump the water all over the mat. My 6 year old really loves it, too. And it’s an easy, quiet and creative activity for when friends are over, too.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning!
customer_reviews.text: My niece love this mat! It’s very big and contains the alphabet which my sister use to teach her 4 year old. It has cute little pictures of animals and their names so the children can learn them quicker. Overall this mat is great for learning and drawing!
customer_reviews.author: Jenner z.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this water doodle mat. There are so many options to choose from but this one has many accessories and it’s actually larger than I thought. The extra pens are great so more than one person can draw at a time. At first filling the pens with water was confusing to get them unscrewed, but it shows right on the sticker how to do it. Not righty tighty. It folds up easily and love that it comes with a stage case. A little bag would be nice to store it all together. Doesn’t feel cheaply made, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but keeps water marks
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for 4 yo son for Christmas. He enjoys it as do I. Clean fun. However after only a couple of uses there are large water marks that even though thoroughly dried will not disappear. If it were not for the water mark stains i would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: joel hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap, always wrinkled, color runs
customer_reviews.text: While my 3 year old nephew doesn't care what things look like, I thought this mat came out of the box looking kind of cheap because its folds won't flatten out. I don't see a way to get rid of the wrinkles. It's also very thin, which makes it feel cheap as well. We couldn't get 2 of the markers to open to put water in them. Trying to use the stencils is futile because the water just leaks out of the edges, so your shape looks like an extra-blobby version of a star or whatever. My nephew loves it, but he's 3.
customer_reviews.author: Meg S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers and super great for moms because.....MESS FREE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old toddler who is still learning that everything isn't meant to be colored on. It's absolutely perfect! It's big enough for him to draw on as he's still learning fine motor skills and if he goes off of the mat it's okay because unlike a regular piece of paper and marker it will not stain my rug! I wish everything in life was stain proof like these aqua mats. I would 10/10 purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fun "painting" for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed this for my toddler for his birthday as a mess free way for him to paint. Theres a lot included in this package, almost too much. I threw away some of the sponge pieces, I think there was an "eggplant" which seemed very random to me. This has been pretty fun for him, although almost immediately he used a regular pen on it. One thing to note is all the water filled pens open in the opposite direction...i kept twisting and twisting them wondering why they wouldn't open for me!
customer_reviews.author: jennys

customer_reviews.title: Pens need FiXING !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ! For me it’s a easy no mess situation for my daughter and nephew. They absolutely love it just as much as me. HOWEVER ::: please makes the drawing pens better. If you aren’t fighting with the pens for them to actually be usable on the mat it’s annoying. You have to write with excessive force. My two year old gets really irritated as it’s only one pen in the whole bunch that you can write normally with and it works as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Adams

customer_reviews.title: Would gift
customer_reviews.text: I have twin almost 2yo boys so I got this in hopes it would be big enough to share and I'm happy to say it is. However they lose interest quickly. But that might just be my kids. It said not to put in the washer so I say it's harder to clean because my boys aren't always clean when they touch it and it makes it hard to get say watermelon juice off of it. I would definitely gift to someone with kids under 5 though just due to the fact it's water markers and not real markers and we don't have to deal with them trying to eat crayons.
customer_reviews.author: traeanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This color mat is amazing! My daughter is messy with markers and crayons but she loves to draw. She's obsessed. It dries quickly so she doesn't get bored or run out of space. The stamps are cute and work well, it comes with many different size pens and one paintbrush. I would give it ten stars if I could, I recommend to anyone who's kiddo is messy with coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC FOR MY 20 MONTH OLD GRANDDAUGHTER
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this for anyone that has a toddler that likes to color or draw on the floor, tables, walls etc lol. My granddaughter loves this mat! I don't let her use the stamps yet because she is still to young to understand that the water much stay in the "bowl", but the paint brush and markers are awesome! And I love that I don't even need to clean it off when she is done, it just disappears! Great price, well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katina N Caulder

customer_reviews.title: Cool Idea But Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I threw this away after about two months. There was a crease on the pad that never seemed to go away even after I applied moisture to it. Additionally, once the pad is used by the kids it takes a while to dry (or reset) so they can start over. The stamps did not come out very well but rather a big blob of just a wet spot. The pens did work though... I think this is a cool concept but needs to be better designed.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching tool.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that for whatever reason a water mark stayed in one spot after the mat dried. Hopefully if I rewet the spot it will disappear. It doesn't bother my 3 year old granddaughter who I bought it for few months ago. She loves it. I just bought a second one for my younger granddaughter for Christmas as she loved playing with her cousin's when she came to visit. It's a great learning tool. She can trace letters, numbers, and shapes. The rainbow of colors is great for teaching the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with lots of accessories! Stencils and pens are easy to use. Stamps not so easy for a 4 year old to use. They turn into a blob for the most part bit that's ok. My 4 yr old and 12 month old can use the pens with ease. My biggest and only complaint really is that the alphabet seems backwards as it starts on the right side. The animal shaped letters are kinda hard for a preschooler to recognize. But still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: While the mat is a large size , the suction cup didn’t have great staying power. The pens or markers were extremely hard to open, the once filled when left flat they leaked all over. While it seems the tops of the markers were well made the bottom,which held the water are very flimsy. Very disappointing and the item was not what I would consider cheep. Not worth the money but really a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Alice A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Pens are horrible to open...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy for little kids. Mess free and easy clean up. However, my only complaint is the pens. They're easy to fill up with water but very difficult to reopen once they've been depleted of water. I struggled quite a bit to open them, and the directions on them don't do much justice. It's not an easy pull to open. I think the manufacture needs to reexamine them and fix this problem. Other than that the rest of it is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining for any age
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old highly enjoys playing with this everyday. While she doesn't typically play independently, this kit has kept her busy and she keeps coming back to use it. The only negative I found is that the suction cups don't work on my hardwood floor, and it can get quite slippery when my daughter steps on it. Other than that, we highly enjoyed the stamps and templates included in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this mat! They sit and draw with the paintbrushes, pens, and stamps that come with it. They make their own pictures and also trace the upper and lower case letter outlines that are provided on the mat so they are also practicing their letters and handwriting! It is a decent size for 2 small children to share. **When I recieved mine it was missing all of the pieces except for the mat itself and stencils. I emailed the company and they immediately shipped out a replacement. I am so happy I did that rather than return because it is a great product! Great customer Setvice!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not just for little kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friends daughter and it was so much fun. She is two and I was even playing with her. Writing my name, tracing the letters, and trying out the stencils. She tried to wear the foam stencils as pants and after she stepped out of them they went right back to their original shape! What a fun doodling set! This exceeded expectations. I am jelly I did not order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: trachi611

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rainy days
customer_reviews.text: We bought our son this because we’ve been getting SO much rain and have been stuck indoors, and he loves it! It keeps him busy easily for an hour, his favorite part is unearthing the hidden letters. We actually like it so much that we bought a second one! We haven’t tried the suction cups, so I can’t speak to that feature, but we’ve loved everything else. Out of the two sets, one had a pen that leaked, but otherwise everything has worked great!
customer_reviews.author: WeLoveOllie

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: The pictures they have on line are deceiving, product not as big as in picture. I am sending back tomorrow, and not even getting a full refund. Have contacted seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it, does not stick to the wall.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my little man. He actually prefers the magnetic drawing boards, but I loved the fact that this is so big and that you can put it on the wall. Unfortunately, the suction cups that come with it, does not stick to the walls at all. But I got 4 Command hooks and that did the trick. He loves drawing on it and that it erases every time it dries out.
customer_reviews.author: TDC

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old son and he loves it! He especially loves the little paint brush it comes with. This product is perfect for toddler because it just requires water and they only can draw on the mat. Easy clean up and no problems! Love it and I would definitely recommend. However, I do not think the suction cups are very strong ( I’m thinking about getting Velcro tape for my wall so I can hang it up). But overall very good product for your busy toddler and I think with proper care it will last a long time 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to use...once. But, it doesn’t dry clean. There are color stains on the mat. Some of the markers bleed all over the mat, making it difficult to write/draw. I missed the return window as this was a birthday present I ordered ahead of time. By the time it was opened and used once, a month had passed. Otherwise, I would definitely return. This is a fun idea, but not executed properly. I would try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Odom

customer_reviews.title: It’s super crappy.
customer_reviews.text: The Mat does not dry out or go back to being blank after 1.5 hours trying to dry it out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roy

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s mounted on the children’s wall. All the parent has to do is twist open “the marker” add water and place into the children's hand. No clean up. Now, an issue that came across was if you have a younger child that seems to put everything in he or she mouth then you’ll have to deal with he or she sucking the water out of it possibly...but I can’t see that being deadly. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Mess free and easy entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, there is endless possibilities and they can use it over and over. It’s been a great help during quarantine with school work for my son going into kindergarten. The pens and container to hold everything was especially nice. I will say with the stamps, less is more on the water. The little felt pad that comes with it need to just be wet, you need very little water to make the designs show up better.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Good clean fun and great customer service-
customer_reviews.text: When I received my order of the Jasonwell Aqua Magic Doodle Mat- it only included the mat, all of the accessories were missing. This was fairly disappointing as this looked like a fun activity for my 4 year old that would entertain her while I worked from home. I immediately sent an email to the company and by the end of the following day I had a new water mat with all of the accessories at my doorstep- I am extremely happy with the customer service of this company, and the mat is as fun as it looks- definitely 5 stars 🤗
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Cute Item, not for prolonged use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought our children (ages 6 and 2) this pad for Easter. It did hold up to its rave reviews as far as usage and children’s approval. My only issue is the longevity of the material - after having had it for 6 months, the material has started to fade or rub off from use. There are a few spots where the color doesn’t show up anymore when the water pens are used. Overall I think it’s a great idea and for the price I’m not too disappointed, just wish the material was more sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P

customer_reviews.title: Stained our carpet!
customer_reviews.text: We were so looking forward to trying and playing around with this mat! Unfortunately after playing with it in the living room, afterwards we noticed bright yellow stains in 4 places on our carpet - it was imported and passed down our family! Nothing seems to take the stains out - beware of this as these look to be “chemical” stains. Also, instructions are poorly written. Hard to follow. Also, caps on the pens twist the opposite way to close and open them. Overall so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LinaG

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old daughter and she loved to doddle and write on this mat. I was tired of wasting paper and this resolved my problem. It is easy to use and clean. My daughter loves to draw, she is showing interest to write Alphabet and Numbers and she loves the little stamps also. Overall I love this and would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kavita

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: This is so great to put out on the floor and have preschoolers play with. No mess and it's so easy to clean up. The carrying case comes with it to fit all the stamps and markers. And all you need is water. The suction cups that hold it up actually stay up (I only used 2 to hold it up) and it's been the most wonderful purchase for our 1 and 3 year olds!
customer_reviews.author: Clemmie C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Acticity
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a great quick and clean activity for my toddler. It really is mess free and quick to pick up and clean up. I like all the shape option and now it came with four markers and one paint brush. We have not use the suction yet. It’s a nice little activity for the price you pay. The pad for painting is a descent size.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Olivera

customer_reviews.title: It is worth for having it!
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter love to write letters, numbers on the mat, they can draw whatever they want. Also, they can play on the mat with the toys that come with the mat. The most important thing is the mat is not messy at all while my kid write because all pen are being written by using water instead of colorful ink.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler who is moving into his writing phase. I love it and am impressed with the set. The only flaw I find and it sucks is the suction. I was looking forward to it being on a wall but the suction does not work at all not even on the floor. I really hope I can find pads that fit to replace the ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is weak and the product smells a bit. One thing that make this a return is that the pen is impossible or to open. (You need to open the pen to place water in there) Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. It is really easy to unpack and pack up. It comes with a little container for all of the "markers and supplies". I personally love it because its hassle free and cleans up well. I don't have to worry about a big mess or my daughter coloring on my walls. Cons: I wish there were more contrasting colors when she draws on the pad... but that's just me personally lol
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This a great! It kept my 2 year old very entertained, as well as myself! It comes with plenty of water pens and stamps with stencils. They come in a plastic box for storage. It does not dry too fast which I have disliked with other brands. You can actually draw something and enjoy it for a reasonable amount of time before it disappears. And what really made it perfect was that you have the option to hang it as well. Very well made. Perfect for a gift for a learning toddler. And no mess!
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Salati

customer_reviews.title: All the fun of coloring, none of the mess!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gift for the young artist in your life! This comes with so many versatile and cool features like stamps, stencils and water pens that keep it varied and interesting for the kids. The colors are vibrant when wet and stay visible for a good about of time before fading (it won’t fade out while the child is finishing their drawing). If they lose the accessories, you can easily treat it like finger painting or use brushes, sponges or similar tools to make your mark!
customer_reviews.author: HappyClam

customer_reviews.title: Toxic???
customer_reviews.text: Good mat but the stamps smell awful. There is no way they’re non toxic they make my throat hurt and have both times I was near it. It’s going back even my 18 month old refuses to play with the foul smelling stamps. They smell like highly toxic glue or bonding agent.
customer_reviews.author: N. M

customer_reviews.title: Such a creative toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this mat so much. He's 21 months and has really enjoyed coloring shapes using the forms that come with the mat. It's so easy to clean and a great idea! It keeps him entertained and I can tell he is improving with learning shapes, colors and letters. We play together all the time and his face always lights up when I pull it out. I really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra J.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for kids 2 and up. Smaller pieces may not be appropriate for kids that are much younger than this or who still “mouth” things. The size of the mat is great for the money and it comes with many play accessories (I.e. stamps, stencils, varied brushes and markers). The water brushes are cheaply made and the accessories case does not fit all the extra pieces. I wish they had included a reusable zipper bag or sturdy box for storage, however, that would likely raise the price point. Overall good gift for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Kreuter

customer_reviews.title: Great Activity for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES to color/draw but he colors on EVERYTHING or loses all his crayons. I found this and he loves it. It's so easy to put together and is ready to use in under 7 minutes. The 'marker' only works on the mat and the stencils are so easy to use. My son is having a blast. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cierria Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Keep kids busy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for toddlers, we were tired of our 3 yr old constantly grabbing pens and markers, drawing on our walls. This kept her entertained and loves that her drawings “magically” disappeared. The only thing that could have been better are the suctions. They didn’t work on our walls but the matt is perfect to lay on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jiv

customer_reviews.title: Can’t open markers to fill them with water
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat but the set came with four water markers... two of the markers my husband and I could not open to fill them with water. I was able to fill the other two markers with water but then was not able to open the tops the markets again to refill it with water. Extremely disappointed because this product would have been great. My husband and I even tried taking off the top of the markers with pliers and still no luck. We can’t get a grip to twist off the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This product was actually part of my attempt to get a jump on Christmas shopping this year. So we haven't actually used it yet. One thing I would suggest is ship it inside another box that doesn't show what the product is. Mine was shipped with the label just stuck to the actual product box, so if my daughter would have seen it outside, the surprise would have been ruined. Other than that, everything looks ok. Came with all that was advertised. Some neat little stamps and stencils I'm sure the girls will love. For the price, it was no brainier.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson (3 yrs old) and he absolutely loves it! The markers are easy for him to handle and there is no clean up needed. As the mat dries the “scribbles” disappear. Although we would like to avoid him putting things in his mouth he still does it, having the markers filled with only water takes the worry away if we turn our head for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hyzny

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Options of Play
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 17 month old grandson. His mommy loves it. So far Cal loves it, but initially enjoyed the marker container. One marker wouldn’t open to add the water. On very tight. Other than that this mat has lots of playing options and will grow with him and his brand new baby brother.
customer_reviews.author: L. McManus

customer_reviews.title: No mess!
customer_reviews.text: recommended by friend who is preschool teacher. My baby is too young to understand drawing but bought it just in case. It's definately a clean way to start baby drawing without making a mess. Once they get older we can upgrade to the real pen and paper and you can reason with them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t matter for a baby uses his mouth to eat that stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it is safe for a baby. My baby always like to eat and touch every stuff by his mouth. Those pens is fulfilled with the warm water, then it doesn’t matter when my baby uses the mouth to touch it. But it is easy for the draw stuff to get dirty. And I haven’t wash it yet, so I don’t know whether it is easy to clean as it said.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Painting without paint... BRILLIANT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant product! My smallest grandchildren think they are actually painting, and they are..with water! Even my older grands aged 6-12 love using this Aqua Magic mat. I haven't tried hanging it, they all love to use it on the carpet and I love not having to worry about messy spills. It's so big, several use it at once!
customer_reviews.author: lynneb

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine life saver
customer_reviews.text: This thing has made this whole quarantine experience so much easier. I’ve been working from home a lot lately, and I just hang this sucker up and let my toddler have a blast! We’ve had it a few weeks and she is still as entertained as she was day one! It’s a great price and my favorite buy in a while .
customer_reviews.author: I shop too much

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: there are few doodling pen that came with the mat but they were either impossible to unscrew or if unscrewed- impossible to screw back so the water would leak out and water would be all over. I sprained my finger trying to open these water-based dooling pen.... will return..
customer_reviews.author: Angel Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not what it Looked Like in pic! It’s small and cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Tomblin

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun for the Little Ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old, 2 year old and 21 month old granddaughters. They were immediately working on their art skills. They colored, stenciled and created for almost a full hour. I am so glad I took a chance on the Jasonwell Aqua Magic Doodle Mat. It was well worth the purchase. I'm sorry I can't share a picture, but my kids are pretty protective of their kids and prefer not to put pictures out on public forums.
customer_reviews.author: Kaya

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. The mat is not big than what I thought. On the picture it looks so big, but in real, Not at all. But it is still big enough for one kid to play with. I just got this mat yesterday, but after I tried. I have to say, there were a lot of leftover stain that don’t fade. Even my hubby said, for this price(22), it’s not worth!
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old granddaughter as she has a new baby sister and I wanted to find something to help occupy her while momma is busy with the baby. She LOVES this. My daughter puts it on the bathroom floor while she takes showers so that her daughter stays in the room. Easy to use for a preschooler.
customer_reviews.author: LA Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I think I love this more than my 2 yr old! He loves to color but always ends up sneaking a crayon or marker and coloring on the wall. I got this set up for him as soon as it came and he played with it for a few hours. Everything seems sturdy .. as long as he’s supervised because he’s rough on everything. Definitely buying this as gifts for nieces and nephews!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect invention ever for kids who love markers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I might be able to keep my toddlers away from my walls with actual markers now. This is the most brilliant invention for kids, ever! Easy to use, does exactly what the package says, but I should have read the dimensions because I thought it was going to be a lot bigger (relied on the picture of advertised photo 🤦🏼‍♀️). It is perfect though for my one and two year old girls. Heck, even me! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Lindamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great granddaughter she just turned 4 she has been playing with it ever since she loves it and her mom loves it because she can get stuff done while Harlee is busy doodling. I would recommend this to anyone with small children that you want to keep busy
customer_reviews.author: Londa

customer_reviews.title: No mess coloring
customer_reviews.text: This is even better than the whiteboard we have for a reuseable drawing and learning surface. Drawings fade after a few minutes so there isn’t constant erasing. The size is good for two young children. I am pleased! Only caution is some parts are small for younger siblings to stay clear from!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca D Reale

customer_reviews.title: a definite buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 yr old grandson and it was a total hit! The huge plus for me was there's NO mess to clean up and if there is, its only water. The colors are more vibrant than I thought and the mat is the perfect size. All the added things that come with the mat are awesome!! If you're on the fence about buying this, don't hesitate. For the price point and quality you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Smart to buy!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clear and easy to use. It is prefect size for kids and adults play together. My 2 year old plays woth it everyday. All you need to use it is water. I full fill five pens in water, and it's ready to play. With this drawing, I have invite my neighbor's kids to come and play with it. This is definitely one of must have for your kids. There should not be age limit. All age can play. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Yu W.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift from Grandma
customer_reviews.text: This gift was sent to my Great Granddaughter who turned 2. However, it is such a great gift her 5 year old sister is enjoying in the fun. I did not want a gift that would take hours for the parents to assembly or that would make a mess for them to pick up--the Jasonwell Aqua Magic Doodle Mat is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry fast enough
customer_reviews.text: It was nice up until the kids wanted to draw more on it but they had to wait a while for it to dry to keep drawing that's the one downfall I have a book that does the same thing but the book dries faster than the mat dead which for a 4 year old that's impatient it's not fun and then a couple of the pens kept leaking so that was a waste the shapes you can get them wet and put them on the but they don't come out right
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great doodle mat!
customer_reviews.text: This doodle mat is great! My son loved it and the colors show up well and once the mat is dry the color disappears. It is also a good size. Just as it is described. My only issue with it was that I didn’t realize it couldn’t be washed in a washing machine and it was ruined by washing it on a gentle cycle to clean it. It is my fault because after I ruined it I saw that the small tag on the back that said it’s not machine washable, but I didn’t notice the tag before I had washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a little one.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about the use of the item I bought it for my bestfriend nephew so haven't seen it in use but I'm told he loves it. I can say presentation of package and quality of mat and materials are exceptional. It came in a small box so I was worried about the size since it's supposed to be XL mat but when open it its huge in a good way. I say it's perfect to hang on the wall of the kids room or lay on the floor of the play area and all the are nontoxic so safe for the younger ones!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Fun and disappears after water dries
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter, her 7 year old cousin and 4 year old cousin love this thing! Great size and so much fun and learning can happen with this. The suction cups don't work real well and will probably only stick on a window or glass of some sort.. Didn't stick on the smooth wall like I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Chriksteener

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughters both like it and it's big enough they both can use it at same time. I wish the container was a little easier to open/close for my youngest but otherwise it works well. I like the stamps and different water marker/pens for them to use that are included.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Lay

customer_reviews.title: This thing is cool!
customer_reviews.text: No markers drying out and no messy paint. Just water! I love all the accessories, we had a ball with the stamps. The alphabets can be traced for learning, but he prefers scribbling for now. This was a really good purchase. I purchased another for my Godson!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Great for clean drawing for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my two year old for his birthday. He loves it, and I love that it’s not as messy as crayons and markers. Comes with several pens, stamps, and stencils. I wish the pens went together easier, they feel a little cheap, but not a deal breaker for me. I saw that a few people complained about the size, but we’re happy with the size. I’d say it’s about 3-4 feet wide and 2.5 feet tall.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherM

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mess free fun for littles! It comes with multiple water pens and stamps. My kids love doing the different stamps. Drys pretty quickly so you can create more art over and over.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: works ok
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for young kids to draw on because of the underlying print that shows up when wet. Not a lot of drawing space. You pretty much have to uncover hidden pictures only. Although it does dry, you can still see the color from when drawn on, it doesnt go away all the way when it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great activity for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This arrived just in time for me to have it when I was watching my pastor's kids. I originally bought it for my 17 month old granddaughter who is my intended user and a budding artist. The kids played with it for quite a while and showed me how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Great new toy my kids are really enjoying!
customer_reviews.text: Great new toy my kids are really enjoying! My daughter age 6 and my son age to Kim both play with this toy. They can draw and use stencils and have a lot of fun and there is no mess. All you do is allow it to dry it and they can start over again. It’s such a great way to keep them occupied. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennay

customer_reviews.title: Toddler winner! Mess free fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son while he was potty training to keep him occupied yet still. And it has been amazing. It’s doors away nicely it’s easy to clean and within a week and a half of playing with it he knows every single one of his ABCs. I highly recommend this for the fact that they can color and nothing else gets destroyed in the house. Five stars
customer_reviews.author: Tera Allridge

customer_reviews.title: Creative fun
customer_reviews.text: Two mat sets for my home day care. The kids love them! No mess. Dries quickly for reuse. Following the ABC outlines teaches them the alphabet and good hand eye coordination. The mats are large enough for sharing with a friend. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fast

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the play room
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try & divert the little one (21 months) a budding artist, away from regular markers and markings on all her toys. It was a hit, easy to use and the 4 year old loves it too. Best of all no marks to 🧽 clean up! Alas after a while the smarty pants was catching on that her doll tattoos weren’t working, LOL 😂
customer_reviews.author: Chicca

customer_reviews.title: Cheap water markers
customer_reviews.text: The water markers are flimsy and the top either won’t come off or falls off. I have had other brands of water markers- these are terribly cheap. The mat is okay but it got ripped quickly. My kid prefers the water coloring books to the mat. Good idea but poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: MEW

customer_reviews.title: Fun coloring.
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this mat. They will color on it for hours. They have lots of fun with it and sometimes little Skirmishes over Whose pictures better. Very durable matte in the pens don't hold that much water in them so they don't create a big mess. Great price fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Afterburn766

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration after first use, but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: The mat stayed discolored after the first use. It's still usable, but water marks are visible at multiple locations. Great idea otherwise, and my daughter loved drawing on it. it's nice to have no worries of marker stains on carpet/furniture/walls.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly P.

customer_reviews.title: 85% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give this 3 stars but my son absolutely loved this activity mat. The problem was I may have had a defective one. I had to use one of my already bought for another toy water brush because I could not open the pens it came with seems like they were super glued together. Other than that this is an amazing and entertaining activity for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Discoloration
customer_reviews.text: After using it once the mat is discolored as if it’s still wet.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old and a 1 year old. They both love playing on this mat! It isn't cheaply made and its decent size. I find myself constantly refilling their pens with water. Which is a lot more convenient than scrubbing marker or crayon off my walls. 😂 I recommend this for any parent with a doodle bug of a child!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal
